# Copilot Instructions for Preserve

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

## Project Overview
This is a Next.js property preservation web application for banks and lenders managing foreclosed/REO properties in North Carolina.

## Key Features
- Property management dashboard
- Work order system
- Photo documentation with GPS/timestamps
- Inspection reports
- Client portal for banks/lenders
- Service scheduling and tracking

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- React Server Components
- Lucide React icons

## Coding Standards
- Use TypeScript for all new files
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Implement responsive design (mobile-first)
- Use server components by default, client components only when needed
- Follow accessibility best practices

## Design Guidelines
- Professional, clean, modern UI
- Blue color scheme (primary: #0ea5e9)
- Clear visual hierarchy
- Consistent spacing and typography
- Mobile-responsive layouts
